title: Client bug that forces me to dodge

embed.description: Look at chat, its shows that I joined the game but it didn't sent me to champ select

body: The bug that I accepted the matchmaking, and later didn't sent me to champ select, and still says I'm in queue. I can't see anything, I couldn't type in chat, nothing, all I can hear is sounds of people banning and selecting champions. That bug forces me to dodge, please Riot fix this.
